generated_sql:
SELECT 
    p.patient_id,
    p.name,
    p.gender,
    mc.age,
    mc.fasting_glucose,
    mc.hba1c,
    mc.checkup_date,
    p.address
FROM 
    patients p
JOIN 
    medical_checkup mc ON p.patient_id = mc.patient_id
WHERE 
    (mc.fasting_glucose > 6.1 OR mc.hba1c > 6.5)
ORDER BY 
    p.gender, p.name;

SELECT 
    p.patient_id,
    p.name,
    p.gender,
    mc.age,
    mc.fasting_glucose,
    mc.hba1c,
    mc.checkup_date
FROM 
    patients p
JOIN 
    medical_checkup mc ON p.patient_id = mc.patient_id
WHERE 
    (mc.fasting_glucose > 6.1 OR mc.hba1c > 6.5)
    AND p.address LIKE '%北京%'
ORDER BY 
    p.gender, p.name;
